name: Mariposa Kids
description: Mariposa Kids offers free play based programming including After-School Program, Holiday Camps, and Summer Camps. Their programs are centered around: Safe Space - Free Play - Community. Combining unstructured play time with engaging planned activities that take place both inside and outside help children develop their social emotional skills while exploring the world around them.
